name: CriegInTime6
description:
This is the game we ran out of time making for GMTK gamejam 2022

The dice rolls accurately which is nice, but ultimately we ran out of time to expand on the gameplay. 

Creig would've squished blobs with his cube powering it up, while pushing it and dodging enemies to align the face side with a corresponding glowing tile.

As it is, some of these elements are in the game, unlinked and unfunctional.

Kudos to James for some sick work on the godheads sprites and animations.

Hope to do better next year!
